channel.title: 317 run.bat error
channel.description:
Error: error during initialization of vm too small initial heap (spams it) run.bat
@echo off title Runeshy Pkz :startserver "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512 server goto startserver
I am running windows 7 64 bit. My jdk location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0 My jre6 location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6 my jre7 location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7 Please help.

item.title: 317 run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @DannyC DannyC
item.description:
@DannyC wrote:

It’s a virtual machine error. Lol’d at most of these comments not having a fix.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @brynd63 brynd63
item.description:
@brynd63 wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:9, topic:412715”]Wait no, my bad, this WILL work

@echo off title Runeshy Pkz :startserver "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xms256M -Xmx512M server goto startserver [/quote]

Wish I could rep you.
Thanks HEAPS!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

Wait no, my bad, this WILL work

@echo off
title Runeshy Pkz
:startserver
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xms256M -Xmx512M server
goto startserver

Read full topic

item.description:

@echo off title Runeshy Pkz :startserver "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx312 server goto startserver
Try that.

item.title: 317 run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“brynd63, post:1, topic:412715”]Error:
error during initialization of vm
too small initial heap

(spams it)
run.bat

[quote]@echo off
title Runeshy Pkz
:startserver
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512 server
goto startserver[/quote]

I am running windows 7 64 bit.
My jdk location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0
My jre6 location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6
my jre7 location:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7

Please help.[/quote]

Try this…

@echo off title Runeshy Pkz java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
